SEARCH
Package jpa.security

Interface AccessTokenService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AccessTokenServiceImpl
public interface AccessTokenService
Contract for issuing access tokens and handling refresh-token primitives.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    createAccessToken(User user, String role, Instant issuedAt, Instant expiresAt)
    Creates a signed JWT access token for the given user identity.
    String
    generateRefreshToken()
    Generates a cryptographically random opaque refresh token.
    long
    getAccessTokenTtlSeconds()
    Returns configured access-token lifetime in seconds.
    long
    getRefreshTokenTtlSeconds()
    Returns configured refresh-token lifetime in seconds.
    String
    hashRefreshToken(String rawToken)
    Hashes an opaque refresh token before persistence.

  • Method Details

    • createAccessToken

      String createAccessToken(User user, String role, Instant issuedAt, Instant expiresAt)
      Creates a signed JWT access token for the given user identity.
      Parameters:
      user - authenticated user
      role - resolved user role to embed in claims
      issuedAt - token issue instant
      expiresAt - token expiration instant
      Returns:
      compact JWT string

    • generateRefreshToken

      String generateRefreshToken()
      Generates a cryptographically random opaque refresh token.
      Returns:
      raw refresh token to return to the client

    • hashRefreshToken

      String hashRefreshToken(String rawToken)
      Hashes an opaque refresh token before persistence.
      Parameters:
      rawToken - raw refresh token provided by the client
      Returns:
      deterministic hash representation suitable for storage

    • getAccessTokenTtlSeconds

      long getAccessTokenTtlSeconds()
      Returns configured access-token lifetime in seconds.
      Returns:
      access-token TTL

    • getRefreshTokenTtlSeconds

      long getRefreshTokenTtlSeconds()
      Returns configured refresh-token lifetime in seconds.
      Returns:
      refresh-token TTL
